pageProduct.name: Avene SPF 50+ Face Emulsion 50ml
pageProduct.description:
General Information

Avene Sunscreen Emulsion SPF 50+ is a very high protection and water resistant facial sunscreen which has been especially formulated with a minimum of chemical filters to respect sensitive skin. It covers a broad spectrum of UVB-UVA protection by using an exclusive combination of active ingredients. The fluid texture spreads easily for even and invisible protection.

Avene Sunscreen Emulsion SPF 50+ can help preventing solar keratosis, sunspots and premature skin ageing. It also may assist in preventing some skin cancers.

Avene Sunscreen Emulsion SPF 50+ benefits from the exclusive SunSitive Protection formula, result of Pierre Fabre Group’s Research:

- Photoprotective system: works in synergy to offer a formulation with a minimum of chemical filters.

- Pre-tocopheryl: Formulated with a photostable Vitamin E precursor

- Very rich in Avene Thermal Spring Water.

Paraben free. Hypoallergenic and non-comedogenic.

Ingredients

Water (Avene Thermal Spring Water). Octocrylene. C12-15 Alkyl Benzoate. Butylene Glycol. Methylene Bis-Benzotriazolyl Tetramethylbutylphenol [Nano]. Dimethicone. Diisopropyl Adipate. Titanium Dioxide[Nano]. Butyl Methoxydibenzoylmethane. Cyclopentasiloxane. Bis Ethylhexyloxyphenol Methoxyphenyl Triazine. Cyclohexasiloxane. Glyceryl Stearate. Peg- 100 Stearate. Potassium Cetyl Phosphate. Vp/ Eicosene Copolymer. Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride. Caprylyl Glycol. Cucurbita Pepo (Pumpkin) Seed Oil (Cucurbita Pepo Seed Oil). Decyl Glucoside. Dimethiconol. Disodium Edta. Fragrance (Parfum). Glyceryl Behenate. Glyceryl Dibehenate. Hydroxyethyl Acrylate/Sodium Acryloyldimethyl Taurate Copolymer. Isohexadecane. Polysorbate 60. Propylene Glycol. Silica. Sorbic Acid. Sorbitan Isostearate. Stearyl Alcohol. Tocopherol. Tocopheryl Glucoside. Tribehenin. Xanthan Gum.

Directions

Apply generously and evenly 20 minutes prior to sun exposure. Reapply after:

- 40 minutes of swimming or sweating

- Immediately after towel drying

- At least every 2 hours

Storage conditions: store below 30C.
